creator: Marc Reid
title: Tableau Image Role + Cloudinary
content: The new image role feature makes using images in headers super easy. Adding the Cloudinary image service makes those headers dynamic and data driven. This post explores how.
contentSnippet: The new image role feature makes using images in headers super easy. Adding the Cloudinary image service makes those headers dynamic and data driven. This post explores how.

creator: Marc Reid
title: Intersects Spatial Function
content: The new INTERSECTS() spatial function, introduced in 2022.4, makes it possible to determine if two spatial objects overlap without needing to perform a spatial join. This post walks through a few examples with points, polygons (buffers) and lines.
contentSnippet: The new INTERSECTS() spatial function, introduced in 2022.4, makes it possible to determine if two spatial objects overlap without needing to perform a spatial join. This post walks through a few examples with points, polygons (buffers) and lines.

creator: Marc Reid
title: Dynamic Zone Visibility Dashboard
content: This post steps through my approach - and the calculations used - for creating a dashboard that shows different charts based on five different analysis scenarios by using the dynamic zone visibility feature.
contentSnippet: This post steps through my approach - and the calculations used - for creating a dashboard that shows different charts based on five different analysis scenarios by using the dynamic zone visibility feature.

creator: Marc Reid
title: Dynamic Zone Visibility
content: The new Dynamic Zone Visibility feature in version 2022.3 opens up a variety of possibilities for dynamically customising dashboards, showing or hiding charts, filters, images, text, containers and more based on calculations, parameters and the selections of marks.
contentSnippet: The new Dynamic Zone Visibility feature in version 2022.3 opens up a variety of possibilities for dynamically customising dashboards, showing or hiding charts, filters, images, text, containers and more based on calculations, parameters and the selections of marks.

creator: Marc Reid
title: Creating Multiple Axes without Duplicating Marks
content: Two approaches to creating multiples axes in your charts without duplicating the number of marks in the view.
contentSnippet: Two approaches to creating multiples axes in your charts without duplicating the number of marks in the view.

creator: Marc Reid
title: Tableau Custom Number Formatting ‚Äì Part 2
content: Part 2 of this custom number formatting post covers: large numbers, prefixes & suffixes, currency, localisation and Unicode with many examples.
contentSnippet: Part 2 of this custom number formatting post covers: large numbers, prefixes & suffixes, currency, localisation and Unicode with many examples.

creator: Marc Reid
title: Tableau Custom Number Formatting ‚Äì Part 1
content: This post covers an introduction to custom number formatting in Tableau with a variety of examples.
contentSnippet: This post covers an introduction to custom number formatting in Tableau with a variety of examples.

creator: Marc Reid
title: Create a Disappearing Container
content: Ever wanted to display a message in a window when your dashboard first loads that the user can easily close never to see again? This post shows you how.
contentSnippet: Ever wanted to display a message in a window when your dashboard first loads that the user can easily close never to see again? This post shows you how.

creator: Marc Reid
title: Adding a Dynamic Reference Line to Viz-in-Tooltips
content: This post shows you how to change the default behaviour of viz-in-tooltips, removing the filter and adding a dynamic reference line using a parameter action.
contentSnippet: This post shows you how to change the default behaviour of viz-in-tooltips, removing the filter and adding a dynamic reference line using a parameter action.
